name: arewecontentwin32kyet
description: Automated and guided reporting for win32k usage in firefox content processes
author: Mozilla Platform Security

scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd client && npm run clean" "cd server && npm run clean" && npx rimraf node_modules/ .cache/ public/ **/__snapshots__/
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
